name: 2D JRPG
description:
A 2d JRPG vertical slice I made in Second Year of University, all art and programming aspects done myself. It was my first time working with Pixel Art and a Turn-Based game of this nature. 

This was mainly a project to learn new elements of engine work and experiment with new aspects of game design. Pixel art was something that had interested me so I wanted to learn and get a feel for it. This style of gameplay is also something I have a great interest in, so focusing more on educating myself I feel was greatly beneficial.
